title: Logging onto chat service...
body: When I logged on today, it stuck on Logging onto chat service. My friends don't see me online and I can't see the Friends screen so I can't text them. Also I can't text / see other peoples messages in the Champion Pick screen. Is there a fix for that? I have tried every single solution I saw in the internet and neither worked for me. I am repairing the client right now. Any ideas how to fix it? (Sorry for my bad English :P)

replies.body: Same issue

This sounds like a network issue having trouble connecting to our chat servers, so repairing game files won't necessary resolve this.  Instead, go over the series of steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help out.  Hopefully, this will get you back into chat!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Eq10E9cc,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-08-17T15:14:22.182+0000)
>
> This sounds like a network issue having trouble connecting to our chat servers, so repairing game files won't necessary resolve this.  Instead, go over the series of steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help out.  Hopefully, this will get you back into chat!

never had that happen before and it seems a lot of people are having the same issue, it's clear it's something on riot side

Basically this has worked for several of my friends, all you do is that if you're  logged on to the league of legends app through your phone, log off from that and then try log on to the league of legends client through your pc/laptop. Hope this helps.

yup this works thx so much :p ive tried the date thing and everything and this is the only working solution for me. try logging off on ur phone app and log back in, so it doesn't say "cant connect to chat", and then ur clients chat will work when u log in

Apparently it worked for me, thank you for the tip.

I just hope I won't get the bug again if I restart my client.

Hi guys, this actually worked for me.
Press Start and type in %temp%
Then delete everything that is possible to delete and skip the ones you cant delete.
It worked fine for me and I hope it will work for you!
Have a nice day! :)
Sorry for bad english hehe
It didn't work for me sadly. :/ Anyways +1 for a potential answer for some people.
type where ?
Press start and type it there
omg thx man it helped !!!! upvote so ppl see!!
Glad it helped! :)
Same, I've tried changing the date, deleting the <username>.properties, but nothing has changed...
Same issue, some solution Riot ?

Well same problem here ofc. I tried the temp delete, change the date and nothing. i dont find that akamai software and running the hextech tool did nothing. All the tests on network were ok and i forced a repatch... still nothing :|

Hi, i have the same problem, i cant login onto chat... I deleted all %temp% folder and didn't work... what can i do?

EDIT: I changed the day to 22 august and didn't work too
Keep changing until it works, this is what i did..
I changed several times... Didn't work... I open repair tool of client... hope it works

Same issue. It looks like there is a problem with the akamai SSL certificate. If I change the date 5 days ahead I get a certificate error and when I import the certificate it works on that date, setting it back to today fails again. I guess there is an issue with akamai config or certificate, hence the date change works. 

I deinstalled the akamai software and voila, everything works like a charm.
How do you import the certificate ? can you explains how you did pls

> [{quoted}](name=MatchmakingIsLol,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Eq10E9cc,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-17T11:21:53.760+0000)
>
> How do you import the certificate ? can you explains how you did pls

You can view the certificate and then import it, but I am not sure that fixes it. I simply uninstalled the akamai software from my computer and then everything works.

So Control Panel-> Uninstall a program -> uninstall akamai ;-) 

My reasoning is that if anyone needs that static content cache it will reinstall it, other wise, no cache but still content.

It worked fine for me thx mate ;)
I feel like on this forum general people are more helpful than rioter kappa :p

> [{quoted}](name=MatchmakingIsLol,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Eq10E9cc,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-17T11:56:52.103+0000)
>
> It worked fine for me thx mate ;)
> I feel like on this forum general people are more helpful than rioter kappa :p

Glad to help, I was lucky that I got the certificate error that set me on the correct path ;-) Let's see how long it takes Rito to come up with a fix ;-)
Same issue, i've checked the forums from when this happened back in 2015 but the solution doesn't work for me.
Having this problem too. Started last night (or was it day before that?) when ranked queues were put down for a few minutes. Nothing in the thread is helping so far.

This happened again. Never used the android app before but logging in/out on it fixed the problem now. Come on Riot fix this please. I don't want to **have to use** an app on my phone,  one I don't even otherwise ever use, just to fix a problem for a game client on my pc.

I finally fixed it!
Change date and time 5 days ahead in control panel, i launched league and then it had connected to chat services. I then changed the date back.
Hope this helps :)

A friend helps me to fix this prob.
He just told me to disconnect from the League of Legend app (on your phone) and that's all and it worked for me so.. hope it'll work for you too guys.
Same thing. Can't connect to chat. However like all of my friends can {{item:3070}}
Same
Same Problem here  ...

Thanks for the reports, friends!  I've seen a handful of threads where some players can't connect to chat.  I don't have any information to provide just now, but in the meantime troubleshooting with the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can still help out some players!
same problem
same here
Same problem .......... i changed the date 4days forward it worked (3 didnt worked) but i have to do this every time when i loging in :/

I changed the date and time of my computer, I cleaned my AppData + Temp folders, I deleted my <username>.properties file, I cleaned all my computer by checking some folders + files by myself and by using CCleaner, I added League of Legends (.exe files) to my Firewall exceptions, I disabled my Antivirus, I executed LoL as Admin, I used Windows 7 compatibility, I changed the language of my game, I asked to my brother from another PC and another Internet connection to connect on my account and the logging onto chat service worked for him on my account (he had no bug), I cleaned my browser, I've repair my game, I opened all my ports, I followed the Troubleshooting Connection Issues guide, I did everything I've found on the forum and on Reddit and nothing worked for me. Finally I started a Normal Game, my client crashed during the loading screen and my chat was working, I played the game and I closed my client after the game by mistake, I re-opened it and surprise, I got back the same bug... I never had this error before now. I simply what to do... I can't call my role when I wan't to play a normal game (I can't even play a Ranked because I am not Level 30), I can't see what people are saying in the chat before the game starts, I can't talk with my friends, I can't use the Club function, I can't recieve play requests from my friends.

By the way, I always get this bug on EUW with any account but I don't get this bug on other regions for example on NA or TR and I don't get this bug on PBE too.

If a Rioter needs any more information from me I'll try to give the most informations that I can give to help you to find a fix for this bug but please try to do something. I don't know if the patch you deployed a few hours ago on EUW was to fix this bug but if it was, it didn't worked for me.

Thank you for taking you time to read my comment and have a good day!
